description:
[How To Play]

The Goal of this game, you connect the number and don't run out of moves in the board has size 5x5. Make line by create link to connect as many same value numbers of dots as you can. the longer the line, you will has more points and the longer you will survive. the number will merged add up in multiples of 2.

Game will over when can't connect one more dots

FEATURES
• Endless time
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Funny sound effects
• Hours of fun, exciting play
• All Free

Game has ads so if you want to disable ads, please disconnect to the internet in mobile.
